summary:
### October 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/SpeedRunEthereum-v2

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged PRs added private notes functionality for admins and enhanced challenge descriptions with skills and time information.
  - Improved user interface by moving the refresh button for sidequests and adjusting the CTA text on the /start page for better display.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved issues related to XP calculation, including excluding `_lastCheckedAt` from side quest counts and fixing font color for modal titles in dark mode.
  - Addressed a bug where the deployment status incorrectly indicated that a contract was not deployed.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing user experience through UI improvements and addressing critical bugs related to user feedback.
  - Continuous refinement of XP calculation and display to ensure accurate representation of user progress.

topIssues.title: Fix /start CTA to first challenge when you're not connected
EIP 712 signature for Smart Contract Wallets
Move refresh button next to sidequests
Bug: "Deploy a contract" false even though user did deploy a contract
How is XP calculated modal titles are hard to read in dark mode
XP shows +5 extra due to counting _lastCheckedAt metadata as side quest

topPRs.title: Shorten /start page CTA to fix display when wallet not connected
add skills, time, etc. to description
Fix font color for How is XP calculated modal item titles
Fix XP overcount by excluding _lastCheckedAt from side quest count
